title: Minimalist Scandinavian Duplex with Green Horizon Views
description: This spacious Scandinavian-inspired duplex offers 3 generous bedrooms and 2 contemporary bathrooms across 128 sqm, thoughtfully designed for comfort and style. Natural light floods every room, highlighting sleek finishes and open living spaces. Underfloor heating and a modern fireplace elevate warmth and ambience. Smart home features discreetly enhance daily routines, while direct access to a private barbecue zone allows relaxation outdoors with ease.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in 'Suburb', Pila's serene outskirt, the property enjoys green surroundings and winding walking paths in an eco-conscious, family-friendly vicinity. Residents here appreciate quiet neighborhoods, modern homes, and a welcoming ethos—yet connectivity to the city is quick with direct highway access. Trends in sustainable living and community events make Suburb a dynamic yet peaceful place to call home.
lifestyle_benefits: quiet surroundings for focused work or leisure
play area potential for families and pets
immediate access to natural walkways and parks
belonging to an eco-conscious and friendly community
target_buyer: Ideal for professionals or young families seeking a stylish, energy-efficient home with good highway access—a tranquil retreat with easy commute options.
market_positioning: Positioned as a high-quality, minimalist residence in green-lightly urbanized surroundings, this duplex appeals to buyers valuing low-maintenance living, design, and fast city connectivity amid nature.
